#2.6.1
The Static Analyzer reads through your source code files (C, C++, or Fortran) and creates database functions, macros, variables, files, and (for C++) classes and methods and their relations.
Drag your mouse over the Static Analyzer window for a brief description of each of its features.
Provides options for specifying and building the database of files to be analyzed, accessing other tools, and other tasks
Query target field, for entering the target in spcific queries
Task identification label
Display area, for showing the results of your queries in the format you select
Graphic controls for manipulating the display of graphical views
Lets you select the format of the data display: text,call tree, class tree, or file dependency
Lets you review  or repeat prior tasks in this session
Lets you define the type of information to display
